div.span: Congratulations to Joslyn and Jake Beneke for placing 6th in Ornithology!

On Wednesday March 4th, the TVS National Honor Society volunteered with Jacob's Ladder and helped pack over 1000 bags of food for Preble County elementary students. Jacob's Ladder provides weekend snacks and food to eliminate child hunger.
We would like to congratulate Luke Meneke as runner up (6-8) and Sam Dehart (4-5) for winning the Preble County Geography Bee 2020.

div.span: Rexarc provided two boxes of new winter coats to support students in need. Rexarc also donated food, and hygiene items to be used to support the Panther Pantry project. Many thanks to this generous community partner.

span.div: Logan DeLong, Joslynn Beneke and Jillian Overmyer representing Preble County Wednesday, January 15 at The State House during Kid Inventor Day!

a.title: Senior CBI student Bryan Sanders recently committed to the United States Army by swearing in at MEPS in Columbus, OH. Congratulations,Bryan.

div.div: Congratulations to the winner, Rhett Emig, 6th grade. Runner up was Tyler Wampler, 6th Grade. Third place was Claire Wharton, 5th grade. Rhett and Tyler will represent TVS at the county spelling bee. Claire will be the alternate.
